main event: A radar operator observed a small object, described as the size of a baseball, moving at a speed over 3000 mph, which disappeared suddenly.
interesting points: The object's speed was estimated to be over 3000 mph,The appearance of the object was described as round and reddish,The sighting lasted less than 2 minutes, The observation was made using ground radar,There was speculation that the object was probably a meteor.
sighted object: a small round object, reddish in color
witness description: G. Grant-Radar, human observer with good credibility
